channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @tehnyit @papascott We knew that üòõ

item.description: @SteveVickersDE @swaggoner Normally we would but the time is too short and the meetings too important. Also neither my wife nor I relish the thought of her changing trains alone late at night.
item.source:markdown: @SteveVickersDE @swaggoner Normally we would but the time is too short and the meetings too important. Also neither my wife nor I relish the thought of her changing trains alone late at night.

item.description: @swaggoner We‚Äôve done the stopover in Leipzig before when driving to Munich. üòÉ In this case it‚Äôs not our dime, so we (by that I mean she) is leaning towards flying to BER, staying there overnight and catching an early train in the morning.
item.source:markdown: @swaggoner We‚Äôve done the stopover in Leipzig before when driving to Munich. üòÉ In this case it‚Äôs not our dime, so we (by that I mean she) is leaning towards flying to BER, staying there overnight and catching an early train in the morning.

item.description: @genevievecory That would be ideal but I don‚Äôt think we can make that train. First meeting is in Schwabing. There is a later train, but we want to avoid transfers in the middle of the night.
item.source:markdown: @genevievecory That would be ideal but I don‚Äôt think we can make that train. First meeting is in Schwabing. There is a later train, but we want to avoid transfers in the middle of the night.

item.description: Business travel challenge: you have a meeting in Munich until 4 pm on a Monday, and have another meeting in Wolfsburg starting 10 am the next day. How do you get there?
item.source:markdown: Business travel challenge: you have a meeting in Munich until 4 pm on a Monday, and have another meeting in Wolfsburg starting 10 am the next day. How do you get there?

item.description: So if Germany bans lighted advertising signs from 10 pm to 6 am, does that apply to shops, gas stations and restaurants that are open overnight? If so, why bother to stay open past 10 pm?
item.source:markdown: So if Germany bans lighted advertising signs from 10 pm to 6 am, does that apply to shops, gas stations and restaurants that are open overnight? If so, why bother to stay open past 10 pm?

item.description:
@SnookerBerlin Nah, everything‚Äôs good. Our business owes them too much money, they have to keep me even with FATCA.

@SnookerBerlin TBH, for personal banking I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve signed for anything since we opened our Girokonto in 1990. For business my wife signs alone. Mortgage was with another bank. But alas, we now wanted an unsecured personal loan to support our son‚Äôs flying habit.
item.source:markdown:
@SnookerBerlin Nah, everything‚Äôs good. Our business owes them too much money, they have to keep me even with FATCA.
@SnookerBerlin TBH, for personal banking I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve signed for anything since we opened our Girokonto in 1990. For business my wife signs alone. Mortgage was with another bank. But alas, we now wanted an unsecured personal loan to support our son‚Äôs flying habit.

item.description: After 30 years at our bank they realized just today they need FATCA data from me as a US citizen. Turned a 10 minute signature appointment into an hour. üôÑ
item.source:markdown: After 30 years at our bank they realized just today they need FATCA data from me as a US citizen. Turned a 10 minute signature appointment into an hour. üôÑ

item.description: @Lynn_Nothegger @jenrazzle Although privately, I haven‚Äôt withdrawn cash in 3 months. Every place I shop takes contactless cards. In our business, this year we finally get consistently more volume from cards than from cash (about 55 to 45).
item.source:markdown: @Lynn_Nothegger @jenrazzle Although privately, I haven‚Äôt withdrawn cash in 3 months. Every place I shop takes contactless cards. In our business, this year we finally get consistently more volume from cards than from cash (about 55 to 45).

item.description: @swaggoner @SteveVickersDE @jenrazzle Our little cobblestone street has a yield sign when it hits the main street, but the main street has no yellow diamond. So technically neither side has right of way. #bekloppt
item.source:markdown: @swaggoner @SteveVickersDE @jenrazzle Our little cobblestone street has a yield sign when it hits the main street, but the main street has no yellow diamond. So technically neither side has right of way. #bekloppt

item.description:
Bike ride T√ºtsberg https://t.co/zU2rbLHyh8

But there were a lot of southerners at the kiosk in Oberhaverbeck. And by southerners I mean southern Germans (BY and BW)! (But seriously it‚Äôs nice to see so many tourists again.)

item.description: More groceries you can‚Äôt find in Germany: enchilada sauce mix. This recipe is pretty close though, and at Famila they had actual corn tortillas (near the root beer). https://t.co/TIXHjao4sL https://t.co/c8DRq5Gh7l
item.source:markdown: More groceries you can‚Äôt find in Germany: enchilada sauce mix. This recipe is pretty close though, and at Famila they had actual corn tortillas (near the root beer). https://t.co/TIXHjao4sL https://t.co/c8DRq5Gh7l

item.description: Off-brand root beer discovered in the exotic foods aisle of our local Famila supermarket. The top case was only 1/4 full, so someone in Germany is buying it (I didn‚Äôt). https://t.co/0eGDGKZ0yR

item.description: Johannes Kahrs may be in the news with negative headlines right now, but we‚Äôll be forever grateful how his office helped us save two Afghan employees who lived in his district from deportation. They are now permanent residents. https://t.co/j3BwBZusyW
item.source:markdown: Johannes Kahrs may be in the news with negative headlines right now, but we‚Äôll be forever grateful how his office helped us save two Afghan employees who lived in his district from deportation. They are now permanent residents. https://t.co/j3BwBZusyW

item.description: Just found my long lost tin box of Elvis. It‚Äôs special even though we‚Äôve never to Memphis. A present from a friend when I was 20. https://t.co/y9De7suVwd
